Direct Known Subclasses:
HttpGetResource, HttpPostResource, HttpPutResource
public abstract class BaseHttpResource extends com.telenav.kivakit.network.core.BaseNetworkResource implements HttpRequestFactory
A network resource accessible via HTTP.

Content

The content of an HTTP resource can be accessed using any of the methods inherited by all resources. An HTTP resource also has:

Properties

  • contentType()
  • encoding()
  • isRemote()
  • location()
  • status()

Conversions

  • asString()

Headers

  • httpHeadRequestContentType() - A MIME content type
  • httpHeadRequestHeaderField(String) - An optional header
  • responseHeader()
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
